discussion.content:
A. Business continuity response

A business continuity response is an event that could trigger communications to the largest audience for a given organization. A business continuity event may affect the entire organization and potentially stakeholders such as customers, suppliers, and partners.

questions.question_text: The project requirements are being determined with the stakeholder, sponsor, and project manager. Which of the following needs to be updated with this information and in which phase?

choices.C: Send a group email to the project team encouraging hard work.
choices.A: Conduct a face-to-face discussion with the team member.
choices.B: Draft a formal memo to the functional manager.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
In a balanced matrix, the project manager and the functional manager share power in this structure. 
Source- CompTIA Project+ Study Guide: Exam PK0-005 by Kim Heldman page 199
